DOC.brief_summary: In retrospective study , investigator examine incidence risk factor postoperative nausea vomiting ( PONV ) patient fentanyl-based intravenous patient-controlled analgesia ( IV-PCA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Intravenous Patient-controlled Analgesia ( IV-PCA ) With Fentanyl Adults Acute Postoperative Pain Control
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adults 20 60 year old 2 . Date 1st , May 2011 31st , October 2011 3 . Patients fentanyl base intravenous patientcontrolled analgesia postoperative pain control 1 . Reoperation within 48 hour 2 . Patients express numerical rating scale pain due sedation
